decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be commenced not later than three years from the date of this permission.
To comply with the requirements of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004).
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise than in complete accordance with the approved plans (as set out on page one of this decision notice).

The Local Planning Authority consider it essential that the whole of the development is carried out and that no departure whatsoever is made from the details approved, since the development would not necessarily be acceptable if partly carried out or carried out differently in any degree from the details submitted.  Also, in order that the development accords with Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.

The proposed development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the materials detailed under Section 9 of the application form and on plan 19-011-08 A-40 Rev. P1 unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To ensure that the appearance of the proposed development will harmonise with the character of the surrounding area and comply with Policy DC61 of the Development Control Policies Development Plan Document

The existing circular porthole windows in the existing building shall be permanently glazed with obscure glass not less than level 3 on the standard scale of obscurity and shall thereafter be maintained as such.
In the interests of privacy, and in order that the development accords with the Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.

Statement Required by Article 35(2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management) Order 2015: No significant problems were identified during the consideration of the application, and therefore it has been determined in accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2018.
description: Replacement of existing painted timber windows and doors with uPVC windows. Modification of upper floor Juliet Balcony railings.
